thread.title: Applying a loading GUI for a map and a map editor question.

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
1. How can I apply a GUI I made be applied to a map when the map is loading? I did try the maps.def, but I don't believe it did anything for me.

2. When I right click on a MDI window with the context poping up with options it seems it closes out after a period of time when I am browsing in it. How can I stop this?

Thanks, Ajm113.

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
